data.title: Polar Fresh Water in a Changing Global Climate Linking Arctic and Southern Ocean Processes
data.sourcetitle: Bulletin of the American Meteorological Society
data.abstract: NORP-SORP Workshop on Polar Fresh Water: Sources, Pathways and Impacts of Freshwater in Northern and Southern Polar Oceans and Seas (SPICE-UP) What: Up to 60 participants at a time and more than twice as many registrants in total from 20 nations and across experience levels met to discuss the current status of research on freshwater in both polar regions, future directions, and synergies between the Arctic and Southern Ocean research communities When: 19–21 September 2022 Where: Online
data.keywords: Arctic, Freshwater, Ocean, Sea ice, Snowmelt/icemelt, Southern Ocean
